body_html:
The depthwise convolution kernel does not use the tensor cores. The regular convolutions forward to cuDNN, which does use the tensor cores.

In the medium term, we want to use cuDNN for depthwise convolutions as well, which will fix this discrepancy.

The depthwise convolution kernel does not use the tensor cores. The regular convolutions forward to cuDNN, which does use the tensor cores.
In the medium term, we want to use cuDNN for depthwise convolutions as well, which will fix this discrepancy.
body:
The depthwise convolution kernel does not use the tensor cores. The regular convolutions forward to cuDNN, which does use the tensor cores.

In the medium term, we want to use cuDNN for depthwise convolutions as well, which will fix this discrepancy.
